channel.title: Video or screen shot guide for walking npc moparscape
channel.description:
someone make a video how because when i follow the tutorials normally, it appears to not work.
remember i am a mac user
cheers.

item.title: Video or screen shot guide for walking npc moparscape
item.dc:creator: @gilbo184 gilbo184
item.description:
@gilbo184 wrote:

What about the moving, like x and y coordinates. so those zeros will be + or - what ever. But then do i just save it and log out and in or do i do something after? Like compilers?

Here is what i put at the bottom of the autospawn:

spawn = 2274 3251 3370 0 3254 3373 3248 3373 2 Goblin Lumbridge

Read full topic

item.title: Video or screen shot guide for walking npc moparscape
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Yeah go ahead, add it :rolleyes:
Your NPC line should be like this:
spawn = 654 2738 5088 1 0 0 0 0 Shamus

You should change the 0 that i’ve put in red to 1.

Read full topic
item.source: Video or screen shot guide for walking npc moparscape

item.title: Video or screen shot guide for walking npc moparscape
item.dc:creator: @gilbo184 gilbo184
item.description:
@gilbo184 wrote:

I thought that too.

But i think mac is different.

can you help me?

I am confused with the end. Most tutorials say compiler but that’s window. Also most say before [ENDOFSPAWNLIST] but i dont have that at the bottom. Is that a big thing or should i just type it in?
